$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout/macros/.text:
\define callout(type:note src title width:100% class) <$let theme-class={{{[[$:/palette]get[text]get[color-scheme]else[light]addprefix[theme-]]}}}callout-title={{{[<__title__>!is[blank]]:else[<__type__>titlecase[]]}}}icon-tiddler={{{[[$:/tags/ShirazCallout/Image]tagging[]contains:callout-type<__type__>]:else[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout/images/note]]}}}source={{{[<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>]}}}>
>style="width:$width$;">
>class="callout $class$"$status$>
<$transclude tiddler=<>field=text/>
<>
<$list filter="[<__src__>!is[blank]]"variable=ignore>
<$transclude tiddler=<>field=title mode=block/>
\end

\define callout-details(type:note src title status width:100% class) <$let theme-class={{{[[$:/palette]get[text]get[color-scheme]else[light]addprefix[theme-]][<__class__>]:and[join[ ]]}}}callout-title={{{[<__title__>!is[blank]]:else[<__type__>titlecase[]]}}}icon-tiddler={{{[[$:/tags/ShirazCallout/Image]tagging[]contains:callout-type<__type__>]:else[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout/images/note]]}}}source={{{[<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>]}}}>
>style="width:$width$;">
>class="callout $class$"$status$>
<$transclude tiddler=<>field=text/>
<>
{{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout/images/chevron}}
<$transclude tiddler=<>field=title mode=block/>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout/readme.text:
; Shiraz callout
Callout is used to describe a short piece of text set in a different format than the rest of the page and intended to attract attention. Shiraz callout contains collapsible and non-collapsible callout elements.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Shiraz/shiraz-callout.html
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Shiraz
